title: leaver buster, seriously? waiting 20mins for 5games because of this?
body:
Sometimes ping(ms) goes like 500~1500, so I died 4 times by this. Then I feel so destroyed, and left the game. -> When I reconnect to League of legends after clean and delete my cookie, hard disk and everything, I got fuckin leaver buster
How the hell is this make sense? please optimize League of legends client. Even previous clients was much better.

replies.body:
It really sucks that your pinging started spiking so much, but leaving in the middle of the match for an extended amount of time *is* going to mark you as a leaver. Leaving your teammates by themselves doesn't make the game any easier on them, regardless of what caused you to leave, so a leave is always going to mark you with AFK and possible LPQ's. To avoid those, it's best to try staying in the game if you can and then start troubleshooting outside of the match. 

Aside from that, let's try to make sure your network is able to get a better signal to our servers. Let's first adjust your port forwarding and DNS settings to see if we can get your connection routed in a better way. If you're not sure how to do that, check out those steps in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).
